大清po咗vlog講發生咩事

Reddit 節錄：

• ⁠After watching this vlog i feel this must be on frontpage, DL got really honest and really cleared some questions people had about the situation and TL problems this split.

• ⁠Doublelift was the ONLY ONE in the entire team that wanted to keep Xmithie in the team. He didn't agree at all with the kick.

• ⁠Doublelift called out TL's coach team in this video and cleared out what really happened about the "bench stuff". He mentioned that the coach staff didn't do their job at telling him about his teammates's feedback. Players wans't talking about issues directly with Doublelift, so they did it via coaches, but coaches failed to talk about it with Doublelift. they did it after they bench him, so the situation got worse.

• ⁠He said he was holding off his comments cuz he was afraid to lose his job. He mention sometimes got subout in the middle of scrims because he was trying to discuss the game with his teammate and the coachs felt he was heating.

• ⁠He felt that his teammates weren't moving on from DL's mistake about "losing motivations" in the begining of the split. Even if that wasn't the case, he was feeling really akward and on EDGE about it alot of the time, he doesn't want to feel that way for the rest of the year.

• ⁠he pointed out TL wanted to trade him, it was never DL intentions in the first place. They did talk about it early just in case and DL said he prefer TSM #1 priority.

• ⁠Steve is the MVP of TL, he praise him alot. He said Steve had the power to sending him to the worst team in the globe, but he didnt and DL was in charge of the decision to where he wanted to go.

• ⁠He never giveups in his teammates , not matter how bad they are looking, he believes everyone can improve from a bad situation. he mentions in S8 Oleh even rage quit MSI or goes mental boom, but he never gaveup.

• ⁠He adressed the comments about he and leena/TSM. Mention that he did not join TSM because of leena, leena did not poach him etc. He would join TSM regardless, he did not tank his stay on TL this year to go to TSM. hes very competitive player and would not allow to something like that to happen.

welp, im glad he left TL. Both teams will be better.

「昨日LCK賽場GRF對陣HLE比賽，GRF雖然以2:0獲勝，有意思的是，兩局GRF推掉對手水晶的瞬間，都亮起了iG戰隊的圖標。不僅是觀眾，解說都對這個舉動很感興趣，並在賽後採訪中詢問，GRF隊員回答因為以前輸給過iG，亮iG牌子是為了激勵自己。
GRF中單Ucal：「亮iG牌子是為了讓曾輸給iG的隊員激起勝負心，18年我輸給過iG，GRF其他隊友（除輔助）19年輸給過iG。」從上圖中可以看到，中單Ucal亮的是S8 iG的牌子，上單Sword亮的是S9 iG的牌子。」
